description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync X401S - 40" LED-backlit LCD Flat Panel Display
The LED backlighting technology in NEC's 40" X401S full HD LCD display allows for a super-slim depth of 1.7" and low power consumption. The premium industrial-grade panel with internal temperature sensors and integrated cooling fans allow it to be used in robust 24/7 environments.
This model includes an Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) slot on the side panel, which simplifies the installation, maintenance and flexibility of your digital signage. The X401S can be deployed in video wall configurations up to 10 x 10 and can be ADA compliant. Enhanced connectivity is provided through DisplayPort and HDMI inputs, while its variable picture modes, real-time scheduler and input labeling allow users to organize sources and create the most optimal viewing experience.
dimensions wxdxh: 92.51 cm x 4.33 cm x 53.71 cm - without stand
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), screen saver, Scheduler Function (with RTC), TileMatrix (10 x 10), Eco Mode
